lead_paragraph: Former German Football Association (DFB) president Wolfgang Niersbach will appeal against a one-year ban by world football's governing body FIFA, he said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Former German FA Chief Niersbach to Challenge FIFA Ban
headline.main: Former German FA Chief Niersbach to Challenge FIFA Ban
